attributes.action: Ban Owen jack and jason off facebook
attributes.additional_details: hello everyone this is a petiition to ban 3 neo nazi skinhead supremesists off facebook , they are causing slander talking about autism and other peoples orientation whether that be gay or anything else id like to raise this attention and kick these people off the social site facebook and raise attention that this is a serious matter and that using neo nazi ism these days is an offence.  thankyou.
